caseTitle: Shaukat Aziz Siddiqui v. Federation of Pakistan, Secty M/o Law and Justice and another
tagline: Supreme Judicial Council (SJC); necessity of holding an inquiry by the SJC before rendering its opinion for removal of judge for misconduct; bar of jurisdiction under Article 211 not applicable in cases of mala fide, coram non judice or in respect of acts taken without jurisdiction; fair trial and due process (Article 10A) requirements were not met by the SJC; therefore, SJC’s Report/Opinion, dated 11 October 2018 and Notification dated 11 October 2018 were set aside by the Supreme Court and Justice Shaukat Aziz Siddiqui shall be deemed to have retired as a Judge of the Islamabad High Court.
